title: Kawng awlsam a ni lo
lyrics:
Kawng awlsam a ni lo,
Vanram kan panna kawng hi,
Hling tam tak awmna kawng a ni e,
Kawng awlsam a ni lo;
Mahse, Chhandamtu'n min hruai,
Ni tinin lawmna min pe zel thin.

Ni lo, kawng awlsam a ni lo, (2)
Isua ka kianga awm chuan kawng a tieng zel a,
Ka phur apiang min chhawk zel thin.

Kawng awlsam a ni lo,
Buaina leh harsatna te,
Hlauhawm tam tak tawh tur a awm reng;
Mahse, Isuan min hruai,
Eng mahin min tibuai lo'ng,
Kawng bumbohte a tirual zel thin.

He ka zin kawngah hian,
Ka ke pente lo chauvin,
Harsatnain min phuar vel mah se;
Ni lawmawm a thleng dawn,
Ropuina ka khum ni chu,
Chutah hlim
in ka chawl hlen tawh ang.
